name: Tefnut
description: Tefnut, the living Heaven's Teardrop, rules over moisture, rain and purification, summoning life giving and cleansing drops.

skills.name: Soothing Rain
skills.description: Creates a rain curtain within a 3-meter area around the ally being attacked by the most enemies. Allies within the area restore HP equal to 150% of ATK per second for 6s.

upgrades.level2: Restores HP equal to 175% of ATK per second.
upgrades.level3: Enemies inside the area have their ATK reduced by 30%.
upgrades.level4: Restores HP equal to 200% of ATK per second.

skills.name: Spirit Therapy
skills.description: Restores HP equal to 200% of ATK to the frontmost ally, then restores HP equal to 50% of ATK each time they are attacked for the next 5s.

upgrades.level2: Restores HP equal to 220% of ATK.
upgrades.level3: Restores HP equal to 75% of ATK when attacked.
upgrades.level4: Restores HP equal to 250% of ATK.

skills.name: Life Barrier
skills.description: When an ally's HP drops below 30%, instantly grants them a shield equal to 250% of ATK (Passive). This effect can only trigger once every 12s.

upgrades.level2: When the shield expires, deals DMG equal to 150% of ATK to enemies within 3 meters.
upgrades.level3: Shield strength increases to 300% of ATK.
upgrades.level4: When the shield expires, deals DMG equal to 180% of ATK to enemies within 3 meters.

skills.name: Rainrush
skills.description: Tefnut releases splashes, dealing DMG equal to 180% of ATK and knocking back enemies.

upgrades.level2: Tefnut gains 50 Energy for each enemy hit by the splashes (can trigger up to 5 times per cast).
upgrades.level3: Hit enemies have their M-RES reduced by 20% for 6s.
upgrades.level4: Increases DMG dealt to 220% of ATK.

relic.name: The Second Rain
relic.description: Casting Soothing Rain triggers an additional Spirit Therapy.

upgrades.level2: Allies within Soothing Rain's range take 50% less DMG.
upgrades.level3: Upon taking lethal DMG, Tefnut becomes immune to that DMG and gains a Life Barrier shield. This effect can only trigger once per battle.
upgrades.level4: Dispels one debuff from allies within range every 2s during Soothing Rain.
